QuestData.Title: Matis the Cruel
QuestData.Description: Matis will be brought to justice, $n; and I want you to be the one to find him and bring him back to the Triumvirate.$B$BScour the island for this killer. Should you find him, use this flare gun. When my trackers see the flare, they'll come and assist in capturing Matis. Return to me after he's been captured.
QuestData.LogDescription: Vindicator Kuros at Blood Watch wants you to capture Matis the Cruel.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Vindicator Kuros at Blood Watch in Bloodmyst Isle.
QuestData.RewardText: The Triumvirate has decided to try Matis immediately. You have brought an arch-criminal to justice on this day, young $r.$B$BYou have performed admirably for two of three; only Aesom remains.
